sysevent_email_action.message_html:
Dear ${event.parm1},

Our records show that you have not yet completed the required Good Clinical Practice training. As you know, you are required to complete a Good Clinical Practice training course at a minimum of every 3 years.   Your training was to be completed by <refresher date>.

 This training must be completed immediately.   

 You may register to complete one of the following NCI recommended free GCP courses online by selecting one of the links below.

  •  National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) course titled "National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trials Network Good Clinical Practice"
  •  Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative Program (CITI)
  •  National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) GCP Learning Center
  •  NIH Good Clinical Practice for Behavioral and Social Sciences Training (00162946)

This course must be accessed via the HHS Learning Management System. The e-Learning course is comprised of nine video course modules. All 9 courses are required to get your certificate.

General questions or concerns about this training should be directed to your <supervisor or COR>.   If you need technical assistance or have questions regarding the training, please contact the appropriate help desk associated with the training you have selected to complete.  If you need technical assistance with uploading your document(s), please contact: ( TBD )

 

Once you have completed your training, please go to Training Certificate Repository to upload your completed certificate(s).  For best results, please use "Print to PDF" when completing training to output a pdf to upload to this site or you may scan the printed certificate and save as a pdf to upload.  Please refer to the Instructions for Uploading GCP documents quick reference document for more detailed information (including pdf document naming requirements).
